title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog box will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension as it is not requested.
7) Click OK.

Observed Behavior: The Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but no file extension is shown.
EB: When performing a SaveAs operation, the file extension should be automatically added to the filename and displayed in the Navigator.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog box should appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension as it is not requested.
7) Click OK.

Expected Behavior: The Navigator should add the file in the specified location and display the file extension along with the filename.
